text: Broadly related is the area of synthetic biology; I've (hopefully - subject to funding...) got a PhD student starting to try some sciml ideas there. If anyone is working on related topics, it'd be good to hear from you.

elements.text: Broadly related is the area of synthetic biology; I've (hopefully - subject to funding...) got a PhD student starting to try some sciml ideas there. If anyone is working on related topics, it'd be good to hear from you.

text: sounds interesting to me. I've been meaning to get further into sciml, and I'm working on bio stuff mostly. I might be able to point them in the right direction or help out
